topics.title: Shared Authentication and Authorization Model
topics.summary: Documents the unified login, token, and role model used across services and UIs.
topics.research_request: Explain the authentication architecture common to all modules, noting where services and UIs differ.

topics.title: Common Build and CI/CD Processes
topics.summary: How services, tools, and applications share build infrastructure and pipelines.
topics.research_request: Document the continuous integration and release process shared across modules.

topics.title: Unified Observability and Metrics
topics.summary: Cross-cutting logging, tracing, and metrics framework used across services and UIs.
topics.research_request: Describe the common observability stack used across components.

topics.title: Extension Packaging and Distribution
topics.summary: Explain how extension archives are built and shared across NiFi, Registry, and MiNiFi deployments.
topics.research_request: Summarize packaging conventions, compatibility requirements, and distribution workflows for shared extensions.

topics.title: Shared Configuration Baselines
topics.summary: Capture configuration conventions and templates applied across services, tools, and automation.
topics.research_request: Document configuration patterns reused across modules and how they stay synchronized.

topics.title: REST Integration Patterns
topics.summary: Describe shared REST contracts and client patterns leveraged by services, UI, and automation tooling.
topics.research_request: Explain shared DTOs, authentication flow, and error handling expectations across REST consumers.

topics.title: Certificate and TLS Management
topics.summary: Document shared approaches for certificate generation, rotation, and trust management.
topics.research_request: Describe certificate lifecycle tooling, shared libraries, and integration with runtime configuration.
